extendedIngredients.name: almond milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2/3 cup unsweetened vanilla almond milk (or your milk)

extendedIngredients.name: bananas
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 medium bananas, peeled, sliced, and frozen

extendedIngredients.name: greek yogurt
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt (any flavor, any fat content)

extendedIngredients.name: unsweetened cocoa powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 Tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder (or 2 Tablespoons for a darker chocolate flavor)

recipes.title: Skinny Almond Joy Milkshakes

winePairing.pairingText: Milkshake works really well with Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. One wine you could try is NV Solera Cream Sherry. It has 4.5 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 17 dollars.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Put all of the ingredients into the blender, in the order listed, except for the toppings. Blend on high until thick and smooth.  You may need to stop and stir/scrape down the sides of the blender a few times.

steps.step: Put all of the ingredients into the blender, in the order listed, except for the toppings. Blend on high until thick and smooth.  You may need to stop and stir/scrape down the sides of the blender a few times.
